sum get owners of a token
desc 20 credits per api call
get all addresses that own your favorite token erc20 erc721 or erc1155 our api lets you search for all token owners on

celo  celo / celotestnet
ethereum  ethereum / ethereumsepolia
bnb binance smart chain  bsc / bsctestnet
polygon  polygon / polygonmumbai

to get started

provide a chain name and address of any fungible token nft or multitoken collection our api will return a list of addresses of all of their owners
you can also get an owner of a specific nft by specifying tokenid in case of multitoken result is an array of addresses
responses
200
type arr
